post:
Hola Everyone!

![](https://memegenerator.net/img/instances/71502904/this-plane-is-going-to-to-miami.jpg "")


After much procrastination and many failed deadlines, our much promised Miami based, Web and Reseller hosting plans are finally live!!


![](https://media1.giphy.com/media/xTiTnoUjpoH4ASb7oc/giphy.gif "")

Let’s turn it up! 

- 20% Recurring discount: **HolaMiami**
- Valid for: Our Miami based Web and Reseller Hosting plans 

- https://nexusbytes.com/web-hosting
- https://nexusbytes.com/web-hosting-reseller

- Payment term: Annual


**Quicks FAQ:**
- Control panel: Directadmin
- Web server: LiteSpeed
- Disk: NVMe SSD
- Free SSL: Yes
- Multiple PHP version: Yes
- Python Support: Yes
- node.js: Yes
- SSH: Yes*
- Site Builder: Yes
- Softaculous auto installer: Yes
- Self restorable nightly backup: Yes (3 days retention)
- Free blesta billing software with reseller hosting plans.
